frontmatter.description: Friends of Chitambo (SCO44337).  Mission - To advance health in the Chitambo District, Zambia, through specific community driven projects

sections.heading: Mission
sections.content: To advance health in the Chitambo District through specific community driven projects

content.content: Friends of Chitambo’s aim is to support health measures in the hospital and surrounding district, by responding to issues raised by the local staff:

content: Improve Emergency Care, to contribute to decreasing mortality and morbidity due to common medical emergencies at district and ultimately national level
Provide nurse scholarships for financially disadvantaged poor students
